abstract: In retaliation for speaking out against the government, Syrian activists living abroad say that family members back home have been threatened and even beaten.

lead_paragraph: At first, Alaa Basatneh kept quiet after receiving a threatening e-mail to her Facebook account in mid-August, worried that it would frighten her parents.

headline.main: Syrians Abroad Report Harassment and Intimidation
